alert.note: Alert for Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 06 at 8:55AM AKST until January 06 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway including Skagway. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds are forecast to ease through the afternoon. Expect very low wind chills of 30 to 50 below zero.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
